subject: Recordings and Downloads (Video)
Football
lead_paragraph: After meeting with N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell, Senator Arlen Specter said that he was “more determined” to continue probing the videotaping controversy that has entangled the league.
snippet: After meeting with N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell, Senator Arlen Specter said that he was “more determined” to continue probing the videotaping controversy that has entangled the league.
